trans-unit.source: Represents a 2D manipulator at an instant in time.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object with the specified properties.
The x and y parameters must both be a finite number.
The unique ID for this manipulator.
The x-coordinate of the manipulator.
The y-coordinate of the manipulator.
The x-coordinate or y-coordinate are , , or .
These values are all invalid.

Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object has the same value as the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object to compare this object to.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> objects are the same type and represent the same value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
The hash code for this instance.
Gets or sets the unique ID for this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object.
The unique ID for this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object.
Determines whether two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> objects have the same value.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> objects have the same value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> objects have different values.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> objects have different values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the x-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object.
When setting this property, the value must be a finite value.
The default value for this property is zero (0).
The x-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the y-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object.
When setting this property, the value must be a finite value.
The default value for this property is zero (0).
The y-coordinate of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulator2D"></xref> object.
